dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare tread upon these sacred ruins, creature of darkness? Your presence desecrates the ancient sanctity of this place.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Sanctity? This place is nothing but ruins and shadows. Join me, and together we can restore its former glory.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Restore? What you offer is but further corruption. However, your words pique my interest.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Interest alone isn't enough. Stand with me, Sekhmet, and we shall conquer as one.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your ambition is bold, Zarathos. Very well, I shall align my energies with yours.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Good, we shall bring forth a new era from these ruins.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A new era indeed. Let us proceed as allies.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Follow me, and you shall see what true power looks like.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I shall follow, but tread carefully. Betrayal will not be forgiven.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You underestimate the strength we could wield together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Do not mistake my interest for weakness. I will not be swayed by mere promises.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then witness my power firsthand!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fool, your arrogance will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your loss. The shadows will consume you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave this place before I decide to end your insolence here and now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough talking. Either join me, or suffer the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You dare threaten me? The sands of time will bury you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am the master of my fate, Sekhmet.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then fate has destined me to destroy you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fine, I'll find others more worthy.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave now and do not return, or face annihilation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Sacred? This place reeks of ancient death. Stand aside before I end you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words for one so fleeting. Prove your might, if you can.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You will regret underestimating me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your bravado amuses me, but it will end in your destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare to face my wrath!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your wrath means nothing to ancient power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no time for this. Begone.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well, slink away into the shadows you came from.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Do you truly believe you can stand against me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You've yet to see my true strength. Continue if you dare.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall revel in your defeat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then come and meet your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You are not worth my time.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then flee, coward, and never return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fight if you must, but know this: I will show no mercy.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mercy is for the weak. Prepare for a battle to the death.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: So be it. Prepare yourself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: En Garde!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Another time, perhaps.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Run while you can. Next time, there will be no mercy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Step aside, or I'll make this place your grave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: These ruins are already my burial ground. What can you hope to add?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then you have nothing left to lose. Join me and find new purpose.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A tempting offer, but I serve a higher purpose than you comprehend.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Higher purpose? Or just a forgotten glory?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You will never understand the sacredness I protect.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You stubborn fool. You'll die with these ruins.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then let us see who falls first.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. I'll grant you your final death.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Try if you must.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your end is nigh, Sekhmet.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You seal your fate with these words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Too much talking. Prepare to fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then silence will be your eternal state.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You're already dead. Why linger here?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I guard the sanctity of this place. Your darkness will not take it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fine, remain with these ruins forever.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave, and do not darken these grounds again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Step aside, now!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You leave me no choice but to defend these grounds.
